price: 119. O, jullie die geloven! Vrees Allah en wees met degenen die waarachtig zijn.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
